sdsmt.edu.thompsonsamson.assignment2

Class ViewListFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • ListFragment
      • sdsmt.edu.thompsonsamson.assignment2.ViewListFragment

  • public class ViewListFragment
extends ListFragment
    The ViewListFragment class shows the list of contacts for the user to see. It has a menu bar to enable adding and deleting a contact. A detail view can be displayed for displaying and editing contact information.

      • onListItemClick

        public void onListItemClick(ListView l,
                   View v,
                   int position,
                   long id)
        Gets the contact when selecting a list view item.
        Parameters:
        l - The listview where the click happened
        v - The view that was clicked within the list view
        position - The position of the view in the list
        id - Row id of item clicked
